articles.author: Lewis Krauskopf
articles.title: Investors on edge as Middle East conflict intensifies - Reuters
articles.description: Investors are watching for signs that the conflict in the Middle East may be escalate over the weekend, potentially ratcheting up volatility as investors await a Federal Reserve meeting and key U.S. data in the week ahead.
